content: That's a lot to take in, but I think I can manage. I've been doing a lot of planning and research lately, actually. I even finally decided to start my own business on January 15th, and it's been a whirlwind few weeks since then. I've been working on setting up my online store, GreenEarth Co., and creating a business plan. Speaking of which, do you have any tips on how to write a good product description?
